name: Epic Roach
description:
"There comes a time for a roach to grow
When the moment's right, on a quest you go
Alone in the desert, you must now survive
Take one step too many, you won't come out alive"

An adventure awaits you in the West. Master the soaring heat and dangerous wildlife to grow your own hero.

"And only, only after you complete this test
Raise your head proudly – you're fastest in the West"
